meta.job_title: Information Technology Risk and Compliance Specialist 2

duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise the Information Security Risk & Compliance staff and escalate risk issues to the Chief Information Security Officer (CISO).
Conduct internal network, security vulnerability, and technology risk assessment testing, and track remediation of identified issues.
Assist in the evaluation of vendor information security risk.
Conduct new hire and Corporate Phishing tests, reporting, and follow-up.
Provide and coordinate Secure Shred support services and REDI project coordination for Information Security.
Prepare Weak Password analysis and reports.
Under direct supervision, identify technology risk and operational concerns and present them to the Manager of Information Technology Risk and Compliance.
Track identified issues for regular reporting.
Perform other related duties and projects as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma with Information Security or Risk Management certifications/courses, or a College degree.
